text:
Company: Bruce-Miller

Role: Systems Analyst

Company Background:
Bruce-Miller is a leading technology solutions provider focused on delivering innovative and effective IT services. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects the communities we serve.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a Systems Analyst who can think critically and strategically to design and implement effective IT systems. The successful candidate must be able to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze and evaluate existing systems to identify areas of improvement.
- Design and implement new systems and solutions to meet business requirements.
- Collaborate with other IT team members to ensure seamless integration of systems.
- Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing systems.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Experience with system analysis, design, and implementation.
- Ability to work collaboratively with diverse teams.
- Excellent communication skills.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $60,000 to $90,000, based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Retirement savings plan with company match.
- Generous paid time off and holidays.
- Professional development opportunities.

Commitment to Diversity:
We actively seek to diversify our workforce and are committed to fair and equitable hiring practices. We encourage candidates of all backgrounds to apply.
